venue.name: L.L. Bean store at Legacy Place

item.description:
Event: Get Spring off to a great start and do a Mitzvah at the same time! Join Mosaic members at the inaugural ``Bailey’s Run 4 Autism,’’ on Sunday, March 25 beginning at 9 a.m. The total distance is 4 miles, and the start and finish is within Legacy Place in Dedham.  For more information and to register online visit: www.baileysteam.org .

Trip's Leaders: Steven ``Koop”  Kostick, runnerkoop@aol.com  and Stuart Green, 781-812-6581.

RSVP:  Preferred by March 22nd, but not required.
item.how_to_find_us: Email Koop or call Stu for the plans

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: 4 mile Run to Support Funding and Research for Autism
